To enjoy gummy vitamins safely:

*   Follow the recommended dosage on the label.
*   Choose gummy vitamins with natural ingredients and minimal added sugars.
*   Consider consulting with your healthcare provider before taking any new supplements, especially if you have underlying health conditions or take medications.
*   Store gummy vitamins out of reach of children and pets to avoid accidental ingestion.

If you've accidentally eaten an excessive amount of gummy vitamins, monitor your body's response and seek medical attention if you experience any severe symptoms.
